Free Item: Creeper Hoodie
春促免费包：苦力怕帽衫
Download it free from the Minecraft Marketplace!
现可在Minecraft市场免费获取！

Cristina Anderca 克里斯蒂娜·安德卡
Nature is blooming all around, but for some reason, all this green is making me anxious. It only takes a rectangular hedge and the rustle of the wind to give me flashbacks to hissing and explosions… But now I can get my revenge thanks to the Creeper hoodie !
自然之息正在这春光明媚之时盛放于世间万物，但入目的大片葱茏总是令我心神不宁。每每在起风之时看到长方形的树篱，那树丛的轻响总让我回想起莫名的嘶嘶声与随后而至的爆炸声，但现在，有了 苦力怕帽衫 皮肤组件后，我终于能报仇了！


Here’s the plan: I will use this Character Creator item to disguise myself as a Creeper and destroy them from the inside. And you can also get one for free as part of our Spring Sale! Download the Creeper hoodie from the Minecraft Marketplace on Xbox One, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Windows 10, iOS, and Android. And while you’re there, make sure to grab Spring-a-majig , a free bundle courtesy of The Misfit Society and Pathway Studios!
悄悄给你透露一下我的计划：我会先给我的皮肤实装这个身体样式，伪装成一只苦力怕，然后卧底进它们之中，再从内部把它们一锅端了。现在你可以在 春季促销期间 免费获取该皮肤包！现在就打开 Minecraft市场官网 或是 Xbox One，PlayStation 4，Nintendo Switch，Windows 10，iOS 和 Android 游戏内的 Minecraft市场 下载吧。啊，顺带一提，春促的另外一张 免费内容包 是一张冒险地图 —— 由 The Misfit Society 和 Pathway Studios 共同为大家呈现的 《春回大地》

Disclaimer: In-game hoodie does not conceal player identity. Side-effects may include aggressive hissing and an urge to blow up nearby players. Please conduct all covert operations at your own risk.
温馨提示：本皮肤组件不提供任何隐藏玩家身份的功能，请在自行承担潜伏行动中可能产生的一些不良后果 —— 包括但不限于听到连续不断的嘶嘶声和爆炸声。
